code: import React from"react";import WordButton from"../components/WordButton";import PageTurn from"../images/PageTurn.png";import PageTurnDarkMode from"../images/PageTurnDarkMode.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookPage=_ref=>{let{page,incrementPage,decrementPage,updateMistakeList,darkMode}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"pageContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"page",children:[page.length>1?page.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WordButton,{initialWord:item,id:index,updateMistakeList:updateMistakeList})):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WordButton,{initialWord:"Loading ...",id:1,updateMistakeList:updateMistakeList}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"100%",height:50}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"PageTurnLeftContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"PageBeneathLeft"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{class:"PageTurnLeft",src:darkMode=="light"?PageTurn:PageTurnDarkMode,alt:"PageTurnLeft",onClick:()=>decrementPage()})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"PageTurnContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"PageBeneath"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{class:"PageTurn",src:darkMode=="light"?PageTurn:PageTurnDarkMode,alt:"PageTurn",onClick:()=>incrementPage()})]})]});};export default BookPage;// Export the component
